Description:
The preview of GitHub Copilot in SSMS is now available in SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) 22 Preview 3! Open a query editor and connect to a SQL database, login using the same GitHub Copilot license you use for Visual Studio or VS Code, and you're off and running to write T-SQL or get help with other tasks such as database management and configuration, troubleshooting, or simply explore your database.

0:00 Introduction 1:25 Demo 7:11 Getting started 7:35 Roadmap
